short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly customize HTTP headers for efficient testing and a tailored web experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Header Craft" is a versatile, open-source browser extension offering unparalleled control over HTTP requests. Tailor your web experience effortlessly by creating, modifying, and customizing headers to suit your needs. Ideal for developers and testing scenarios, Header Craft ensures a seamless and efficient browsing journey with its intuitive interface and dynamic features. Craft precise headers, streamline testing, and enhance your online interactions with ease. The extension is delivered in human-readable form, allowing transparency and flexibility for users.
